description: Try our easy to follow Baby Potato, Basil & Pine Nut Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Vegan,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Baby Potato, Basil & Pine Nut Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put the potatoes in a large saucepan of lightly salted water and bring to the boil. Cook for 12-15 minutes until tender. Drain well and transfer to a large bowl. Cut any large potatoes in half.
Whisk the oil, vinegar and a little salt and pepper together in a small bowl. Add half to the potatoes, stir well and leave to cool completely.
Add the pine nuts, the remaining dressing and basil, stir well and serve.
